name: domainstack
title: Domainstack
description: Lookup WHOIS, DNS, SSL certificates, hosting, and SEO data for any domain
author: jakejarvis

commands.name: lookup-domain
commands.title: Lookup Domain
commands.subtitle: Domainstack
commands.description: Look up WHOIS, DNS, SSL, and hosting information for a domain

commands.name: inspect-tab
commands.title: Inspect Current Tab
commands.subtitle: Domainstack
commands.description: Inspect the domain of the currently active browser tab

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
